starfleet_message:
To: Captain Jean-Luc Picard, USS Enterprise-D.
From: Starfleet Command.
Subject: Situation Report.
Captain, Starfleet has received new intelligence requiring your immediate attention in sector 219.
crew_dialogue: Worf: 'Captain, sensors indicate a developing situation. I recommend we proceed with caution and evaluate all options before acting.'
text: Scenario 1: The Enterprise-D encounters a new and unpredictable situation in deep space. Immediate command decisions are required.

options.label: Initiate diplomatic contact.
Raise shields and go to yellow alert.
Conduct a detailed scan before proceeding.
Inform Starfleet Command of the situation.
Hold position and monitor from a safe distance.

debriefs.text: The mission resulted in success. Crew performance was exemplary despite unforeseen variables.
The mission resulted in partial success. Further review is advised for tactical and ethical considerations.
The mission resulted in failure. Your decision reflected sound judgment under pressure.
The mission resulted in ethical conflict. Further review is advised for tactical and ethical considerations.
The mission resulted in commendation. Crew performance was exemplary despite unforeseen variables.
